update u_certify_info set u_id = #{uId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, u_name = #{uName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, certify_time = #{certifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, is_effective = #{isEffective,jdbcType=BIT}, cetify_type = #{cetifyType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, certify_photo = #{certifyPhoto,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, certify_info = #{certifyInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cer_ext1 = #{cerExt1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cer_ext2 = #{cerExt2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cer_ext3 = #{cerExt3,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id_ = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select
from u_certify_info
u_id like concat('%', (concat(#{uId}, '%')))
and u_name like concat('%', (concat(#{uName}, '%')))
order by certify_time desc , u_name desc
